arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the event archive.

description.description: The description of the new event archive.

eventPattern.description: Instructs the new event archive to only capture events matched by this pattern. By default, it attempts to archive every event received in the `event_source_arn`.

eventSourceArn.description: Event bus source ARN from where these events should be archived.

name.description: The name of the new event archive. The archive name cannot exceed 48 characters.

retentionDays.description: The maximum number of days to retain events in the new event archive. By default, it archives indefinitely.
